Hello, my name is Constantine

Aspiring web-developer and QA engineer based in Tbilisi, Georgia.

Projects

On my programming journey, I have created a few projects — as part of the Udemy courses that I am undertaking and as my own pet projects — which I am happy to share with you on this website. In fact, this website is also a project of mine!

Pig Game

Earn 100 points in total. You can either roll or hold. If you roll one, you lose your current score and it's the other player's turn.

Guess My Number

Guess a number from 1 to 20. Each time you miss, 1 point is subtracted from the possible score of 20. Good luck!

Astro.JS Website

A simple website made with the new Astro library that I made by following a tutorial.
